Text: Sorry,I take handbrake for compression ,but I take bd rebuilder back with shrinking .Bd rebuilder is better .But de movie is good .

Does not play correctly for me.  Sound & video don't always sync, and movie seems to jump around almost randomly.  Pulled one of the several ~8 GB versions instead, and it works fine.

Quite literally the first movie I've ever had that doesn't work, excluding Cinavia branded releases, so I'm pretty sure it's not me.
